Goal Representation: ['1. Cut the chicken into pieces.', '2. Put the chicken pieces back in the fridge.']

behavior cut_chicken_in_pieces(chicken:item, cutting_board:item, knife:item):
    body:
        move_to_cutting_board(chicken, cutting_board) # Move the chicken to the cutting board
        place_chicken_on_board(chicken, cutting_board) # Ensure the chicken is placed on the board
        achieve_once inhand(knife) # Temporarily hold the knife
        cut_chicken(chicken, cutting_board, knife) # Cut the chicken into pieces

behavior __goal__():

        bind chicken: item where:
            is_food_chicken(chicken)
        # Select the chicken
        
        bind cutting_board: item where:
            is_cutting_board(cutting_board)
        # Select the cutting board
        
        bind knife: item where:
            is_knife(knife)
        # Select the knife

        cut_chicken_in_pieces(chicken, cutting_board, knife) # Cut the chicken into pieces
